original_title: Invocations of Canyons and Boulders (for Stan Brakhage)
overview: "INVOCATION is Higgins' Satie movie... the purest attempt to clear art from any or all historical, esthetic, thematic, ornamental claptrap to regain the lost-eye consciousness." - Jonas Mekas
title: Invocations of Canyons and Boulders (for Stan Brakhage)
